sn19:1.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn19:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
sn19:1.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā lakkhaṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etadavoca:
sn19:1.1.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
sn19:1.1.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
sn19:1.1.8: Atha kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn19:1.1.9: “ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19:1.1.11: Bhagavato maṃ santike etaṃ pañhaṃ pucchā”ti.
sn19:1.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn19:1.2.2: “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
sn19:1.2.3: Ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
sn19:1.3.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:1.3.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:1.4.3: ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti, yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissati.
sn19:1.4.4: Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭho ahosi, api cāhaṃ na byākāsiṃ.
sn19:1.4.5: Ahañcetaṃ byākareyyaṃ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṃ.
sn19:1.4.6: Ye me na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
sn19:1.4.7: Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi.
sn19:1.4.8: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṃ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti.
sn19:2.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ maṃsapesiṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:2.1.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:2.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi …pe….
sn19:3.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ maṃsapiṇḍaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:3.1.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:3.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sākuṇiko ahosi …pe….
sn19:4.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ nicchaviṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:4.1.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:4.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe orabbhiko ahosi …pe….
sn19:5.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ asilomaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:5.1.2: Tassa te asī uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19:5.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosi …pe….
sn19:6.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ sattilomaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:6.1.2: Tassa tā sattiyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19:6.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe māgaviko ahosi …pe….
sn19:7.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ usulomaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:7.1.2: Tassa te usū uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19:7.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe kāraṇiko ahosi …pe….
sn19:8.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ sūcilomaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:8.1.2: Tassa tā sūciyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
sn19:8.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūto ahosi …pe….
sn19:9.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ sūcilomaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:9.1.2: Tassa tā sūciyo sīse pavisitvā mukhato nikkhamanti;
sn19:9.1.9: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūcako ahosi …pe….
sn19:10.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ kumbhaṇḍaṃ purisaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:10.1.2: So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati.
sn19:10.1.4: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:10.1.6: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭako ahosi …pe….
sn19:10.2.5: Yo ca sibbiyati sūcako hi so,
sn19:11.1.3: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ purisaṃ gūthakūpe sasīsakaṃ nimuggaṃ …pe…
sn19:11.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe pāradāriko ahosi …pe….
sn19:12.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ purisaṃ gūthakūpe nimuggaṃ ubhohi hatthehi gūthaṃ khādantaṃ …pe…
sn19:12.1.2: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
sn19:12.1.3: So kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhusaṃghaṃ bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyo gūthassa pūrāpetvā etadavoca—
sn19:12.1.4: aho bhonto yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjantu ceva harantu cā’ti …pe….
sn19:13.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ nicchaviṃ itthiṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:13.1.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:13.1.4: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṃyeva rājagahe aticārinī ahosi …pe….
sn19:14.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ itthiṃ duggandhaṃ maṅguliṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:14.1.2: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:14.1.4: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṃyeva rājagahe ikkhaṇikā ahosi …pe….
sn19:15.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ itthiṃ uppakkaṃ okiliniṃ okiriniṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:15.1.3: esā, bhikkhave, itthī kaliṅgassa rañño aggamahesī ahosi.
sn19:16.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:16.1.2: Tassa ure akkhīni ceva honti mukhañca.
sn19:16.1.3: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19:16.1.5: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe hāriko nāma coraghātako ahosi …pe….
sn19:17.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ bhikkhuṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19:17.1.2: Tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto.
sn19:17.1.4: eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu ahosi …pe….
sn19:21.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ sāmaṇeriṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ.
sn19:21.1.2: Tassā saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto.
sn19:21.2.3: ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti, yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissati.
sn19:21.2.4: Pubbeva me sā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi.
sn19:21.2.6: Ahañcetaṃ byākareyyaṃ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṃ.
sn19:21.2.7: Ye me na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
sn19:21.2.8: Esā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosi.
sn19:21.2.9: Sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṃ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti.
